import sys
T = int(raw_input())

while  T :

	n , p = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
	
	x = pow(n,p)
	
	res = x
	
	sum = 0
	
	while res :
		
		sum = sum + (res%10)
		res/=10
	
	print x , sum
	
	T-=1
	
def pow(n,p) :

	if p == 0 :
		return 1
	else :
		if p%2 :
			return n*pow(n,p-1)
		else :
			k = pow(n,p/2)
			return k*k
